author: pdobacz
content: Please take a look at [the EOF testing matrix](https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/implementation_matrix.md#testing-readiness-matrix) and update before the EOF impl call tomorrow. Most recent test releases are EEST v1.1.0 (or v1.1.1, same coverage IIUC), ethereum/tests v14.1 and evmone v0.13.0

author: jochembrouwer
content: Small update from EthJS side: we have ran the latest EOF fixtures but these triggered some errors, we will look into this ASAP
